<junkmail@...> writes:

> Gentle-readers and poor souls,
>
> 	From this list I met Curran, Darcy and Rick for the first 

Thank you for the show writeup Tom. I found it to be a very good one,
from the lectures and to being able to meet a lot of people known only
by email address previously.

Many thanks to those who graciously supplied their loved items for
display (particularly those at the far left of the Masamune display,
three of them were pure dream objects). Thanks also to those who put in
efforts to make all of these things happen.

- darcy

(Note to self: *never* make Tom angry, and if this happens, run :-)
